name: Food Bank of Contra Costa & Solano
description: The Food Bank of Contra Costa and Solano serves two counties with free food distribution, helping fight hunger through a network of partners and direct community programs.
fullDescription: The Food Bank of Contra Costa and Solano serves two counties with free food distribution, helping fight hunger through a network of partners and direct community programs.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free groceries at distribution sites
- Mobile food pantries
- Senior food programs
- Fresh produce distributions
- CalFresh enrollment assistance
- No ID or proof of income required
howToGetIt: Use the online Food Locator to find a distribution site near you. Bring bags to carry food. Most sites operate weekly; check individual site schedules.
